question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. woman in white
B. blue bowl
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The blue bowl is on the countertop in the foreground, while the woman in white is standing further back in the room, making the bowl clearly closer to the camera.
